question: Which state/UT is set to restart its start vaccination and immunization from September 2020?
explanation:
The Delhi Governmentâ€™s Women and Child Development Ministry is set to re-start vaccination and immunization of children from September 2020.
The programme was halted due to the nationwide COVID 19 lock-down. It will be implemented through 10,000 Anganwadi centres in Delhi with the help of ASHA and Anganwadi Workers.
